meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I laid the book on the table.
meanings.sent2: She laid the blanket over the sleeping child.
meanings.sent3: The hen laid her eggs in the cozy nest.
meanings.sent4: The foundation of trust was laid between them.
meanings.sent5: He carefully laid out the tools before starting the project.

meanings.sent1: The teacher laid the chalk on the blackboard.
meanings.sent2: He laid the groceries on the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent3: She laid the cards on the table for the game.
meanings.sent4: The sun laid its warm rays on the garden.
meanings.sent5: The cat laid the mouse gently on the floor.

meanings.sent1: The laid table was ready for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The laid bricks formed a sturdy wall.
meanings.sent3: The laid out plan was executed perfectly.
meanings.sent4: The laid foundation ensured a stable structure.
meanings.sent5: The laid path led through the peaceful garden.

meanings.sent1: The laid carpet added warmth to the room.
meanings.sent2: The laid tiles created a beautiful mosaic.
meanings.sent3: The laid out puzzle was challenging to complete.
meanings.sent4: The laid groundwork made the project easier.
meanings.sent5: The laid foundation supported the entire building.

meanings.sent1: The laid nest was full of eggs.
meanings.sent2: The laid hen was protective of her nest.
meanings.sent3: The laid eggs were carefully incubated.
meanings.sent4: The laid chicks hatched in the warm nest.
meanings.sent5: The laid nest was a sign of new life on the farm.
